globalTableHeading: Let's find out how to improve Asgard

steps.title: We will find the "settings" item
steps.description:
In the left column
that's where we'll have to go

steps.title: we should already be in the "General Settings" section
steps.description: there we can enable the two Osh damage optimizer buttons

steps.title: Let's go to the game
steps.description:
in the guild raid section

We can press Ctrl+Alt+A to get there faster

steps.title: A menu will appear before the battle
steps.description:
we can decide how many credits to spend and what the maximum number of attempts to use will be.

ATTENTION! the maximum limit also depends on the computer.
the best computers reach 150-200 attempts.

steps.title: top left
steps.description:
we will see the score we could get with a completely automatic fight

Be careful not to waste credits!!

You can also start the battle in manual mode and then decide the best result.

Manual mode will take time away from the recalculation.

steps.title: During the battle you will be able to see
steps.description:
the time remaining for the recalculation.
1- the damage you would do with your manual battle ( until you press "skip battle"
2 - the score you would have with an automatic battle
3 - the best result obtained with the optimization
4 - the number of attempts that have been made

steps.title: At the end of the battle
steps.description: click the number on the left with the countdown
